value.name: Louisiana shooting victim Alton Sterling's name dropped on 'Station 19' Thursday night; watch video clip
value.description: Sterling, killed in a police officer-involved shooting in Baton Rouge in ... "And Alton Sterling and Freddie Gray and Tarika Wilson and Eric Garner and Janisha Fonville and Philando Castille and Korryn Gaines and Tony McDade," Vic goes on.

value.name: Woman Killed in Officer-Involved Shooting | Charlotte Observer
value.description: Police identified the dead woman as Janisha Fonville. She was shot and killed on Bellafonte Drive by Officer Anthony Holzhauer, who's been a Charlotte-Mecklenburg police officer since 2010 ...

value.name: Life after death: A Black mother’s perspective
value.description: One White officer is found guilty of murdering a Black man – a slow, agonizing death that was recorded and televised, causing severe trauma to the people watching it around the world. A textbook ...
